original_text: therefore thus says the Lord of hosts: “Behold, I will punish them. The young men shall die by the sword, their sons and their daughters shall die by famine,
korean_text: 그러므로 만군의 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 보라 내가 그들을 벌하리니 청년들은 칼에 죽으며 자녀들은 기근에 죽고

sentences.original_text: therefore thus says the Lord of hosts:
The young men shall die by the sword,
their sons and their daughters shall die by famine,
